entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support cookie values with comma #58773
  • Add a test for verifying non-modified reader state in JsonDocument.ParseValue on deep values #58772
  • System.Text.Json source generator fails to deserialize init-only properties #58770
  • [API Proposal]: Add `System.Reflection.Metadata.Ecma335.ControlFlowBuilder.Reset`. #58765
  • regex: different behavior between .NET Framework and .NET Core #58757
  • The actual `ExceptBy` and IntersectBy` APIs differ from the approved APIs #58756
  • DOTNET_ROLL_FORWARD=Major ignores in new builds of .net 6 since preview 7 #58754
    7.0.0
  • Support the Windows 11 I/O ring API #58752
  • [System.Net.Http.Json] System.Net.Http.Json - Undoc 6.0 APIs #58750
    6.0.0
  • createdump cannot write to stdout #58747
    7.0.0
  • When I run the diagnostic analysis tool, got some warning #58743
  • [ZlibStream] ArgumentOutOfRangeException when passing in compression levels past level 3 (cast from manual enum defining all of the native compression levels). #58742

Closed

  • HttpClient Silently Omits Message Body If Header Has Trailing Newline #58769
  • [QualityWeek] Check-Release diffs with x86 #58063
    7.0.0
  • Allow dump from createdump to be piped to another program (e.g. for compression) #9840
    Future
  • Using Covariant returns for RuntimeType crashes during crossgen #45356
    5.0.x
  • PerfScore inconcistencies with memory accesses #49647
    Future
  • Assertion failed '(gcInfo.gcRegGCrefSetCur & (RBM_CALLEE_TRASH & ~RBM_ARG_REGS)) == 0' #58539
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add `JitEnregStats` complus. #58776
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Throw on unsupported types in src gen #58775
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.0
  • Add explicit APIs to Double/Single/Half/TimeOnly #58774
    area-System.Numerics, blocking-release, 6.0.0
  • Decrease refcount of unreachable finally properly #58771
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Issue diagnostic warnings when context types don't indicate serializable types #58768
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Support duplicated type names with src gen #58766
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Change namespace of embedded Cecil in ILStrip task #58764
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Change namespace of embedded Cecil in ILStrip task #58763
    6.0.0
  • WIP: Cleanup of runtime test build scripts #58762
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Always write sample events in EventPipe based on sample frequency. #58761
    area-Tracing-mono
  • Update branding for 5.0.11 #58760
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Treat ALWAYS of callf+always pair normally and fix live range coalescing #58749
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Try deleting -Werror in config scripts #58746
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • System.Net.Ping: Skip TimeoutIsRespected test if network is unreachable #58745
    area-System.Net
  • Make GCMemoryInfoData blittable #58738
    area-System.Memory

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Skip allocation for ZeroInit writeThru intervals #58767
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Clean up tests under src/tests/reflection #58673
    area-System.Reflection-coreclr
  • Switch weights to doubles to mitigate rounding inaccuracies and use epsilon when sorting locals #58630
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix PerfScore inconcistencies #56812
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Skip allocation for ZeroInit writeThru intervals #58677
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove unused test libraries under classloader #58596
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Support duplicated type names with src gen #58448
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Avoid S.S.Permissions dependency in S.S.Crypto.Xml #58731
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Support JsonConverterFactory with src-gen #58652
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json
  • [release/6.0] [HTTP/3] Stress disable offending op causing server errors #58541
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] add TLS 1.3 support to WinHttp #58718
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Add support for variance to IDIC #58670
    area-Interop-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Undo struct promotion on "RetInd" code path #58602
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [mini] Don't add unbox tramopline on generic DIM calls #58585
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add support for variance to IDIC #58646
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Remove Reflection.Emit packages from the Windows Compatibility Pack on frameworks greater than .NET Standard 2.0. #56973
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Revert "Fix HAVE_PTHREAD_CONDATTR_SETCLOCK detection on Android" #58755
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] [mono] win32 implementation of g_get_current_dir #58555
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add threading test for Regex #58595
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • PosixSignalRegistrationTests.Unix: validate signal pal mapping #58711
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Remove conditional compilation conditions that are no longer possible #58377
    area-System.Security, community-contribution

Updated

  • More cleanups in Assembly/Loader/Binder area #58462
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add support for native relinking after Build, and AOT after publish #57556
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Support aot without trimming #58306
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Upgrade to net7.0 and remove target frameworks #58011
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix setting creation date for OSX & setting dates on symlinks on Unix #49555
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [WASM] Node Debugger #56473
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [WIP] Fix LastWriteTime and LastAccessTime of a symlink on Windows and Unix #52639
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Optimize Vector128/256.Equals via TestZ #55875
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Send RST_STREAM instead EOF when sending request body is cancelled #58548
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [release/5.0] Add support for variance to IDIC #58672
    Servicing-consider, area-Interop-coreclr, 5.0.x
  • [DRAFT][wasm] WebSocket improve send buffers #58199
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net
  • [mono] Revive FullAOT test lanes #55362
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • [wasm] Enable AOT, and Wasm.Build.Tests on windows #58578
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Add System.Net.Http ServerCertificateCustomValidationCallback ILLink Suppression #58508
    area-System.Net.Http, os-android, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] The signal enum in the native library should match the managed code. #58682
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 6.0.0
  • Expose nint/nuint overloads for BitOperations #58733
    area-System.Numerics
  • DO NOT MERGE: Macos builds on perf measure pool #58514
    * NO MERGE *
  • [wasm] WebSocket perf test #58730
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Make bashing to constants nicer #58171
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Convert Interlocked intrinsics to NamedIntrinsics #55170
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add IDisposable interface to GCHandle #55596
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Retarget DOTNETHOME when installing x64 on ARM64 #58669
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Fix Windows 8 detection. #58736
    area-System.Security
  • Add documentation to System.Net #57855
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add perfmap debug directory entry to crossgen2 output as needed #58552
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix source generation support for tuples with explicitly named elements #58723
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • [DRAFT][MONO][TEST] Wasm AOT runtime tests #57963
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • Delete duplicate runtime tests #58676
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Enforce scatter/gather file I/O Windows API requirements et. al. #58423
    area-System.IO
  • [release/6.0] Fix detection of unsupported links #58399
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Make sure EventPipe streaming thread won't write session->streaming_thread after session free. #58710
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Better codegen for `(T)x | (T)y` #58727
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Increase some of the DnsEndPointTest timeouts #58617
    area-System.Net, 6.0.0
  • Always write sample events in EventPipe based on sample frequency. #58720
    area-Tracing-mono
  • Optimize division by constant after AND or RSZ #55778
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use AVX2 in codegen for GT_STORE_BLK #55604
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • only cache credentials on success #58594
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Initialize compCurBB during fgInsertGCPoll #57334
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable global constant propagation for small types #57726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Disable test parallelization in installer tests #58604
    area-HostModel
  • Nullable annotation for System.Windows.Extensions #57896
    area-Microsoft.Win32, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add cast when replacing promoted struct with field in lowering #58589
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Simplify .NETFramework tfms #58558
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Align preallocationSize behavior #58726
    area-System.IO
  • Improve SortedSet DeepCopy performance #56561
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add ObjectDisposedException.Throw for object instance and type #58684
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix: Incorrect order of checks for TypeBuilder `GetConstructor` and `GetField` method #53645
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • First round of converting System.Data.OleDb to COMWrappers #54822
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • removed argument requestId from loopbackserver.cs #58678
    area-System.Net
  • Refactor XmlWriter{Async} #58105
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [iOS] Make sure IPGlobalProperties and NetworkInterface.GetIsNetworkAvailable methods return the correct info #57096
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Net, os-ios, 7.0.0
  • Implement SinPi, CosPi and TanPi and inverses #53675
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Use CustomCommand to run runtime tests for mobile targets on helix #57292
    area-Infrastructure
  • [Group 2] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Abstractions` #57401
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Rev Alpine WithNode from 3.9 to 3.13 #57324
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • Don't force using the system libunwind for source-build #58641
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Move optdata and version file generation up to MSBuild from build-runtime #58674
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add tizen armel build CI for pull request #56281
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update ELT profiler tests to include tests when a function returns HFA/HVA struct on Arm64 #54912
    arch-arm64, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Does ARM now supported by ObjWriter? #1526

Closed

  • ARM build failed #1513

PullRequests

Created

  • More cleanup for Regex SRM #1529
  • Cleanup after moving from CoreRT repo #1527
  • generalized most SRM unit tests to None and Compiled #1525
  • Add `/guard:cf` flavor of bootstrapper #1523
    area-NativeAOT

Merged

  • Drop unnescessary suffix 2 from Rhp functions #1528
  • Remove RhpReversePInvoke #1524
  • More cleanup of Regex SRM #1520
  • Bump ObjWriter #1522
  • lifted UnicodeChar tests to NonBacktracking mode and Compiled mode also #1521
  • support for Regex.Split in NonBacktracking mode #1506

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Reflection fix - add test and dependency for GetDependenciesDueToAccess #1508

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Known workloads show workloads which are not intended for public consumption #20709
  • ReadyToRun publishing fails in 6.0 due to NETSDK1095 #20701
  • NET6_0_OR_GREATER not defined in net6.0 project built with VS2019 #20700
  • [dotnet-sdk-6.0.100-rc.2.21456.8]The output content is empty when starting the global tool application dotnet-format #20694

Closed

  • Hide `--download-to-cache` and `--from-cache` parameters for workload install and update #20642

PullRequests

Created

  • Update BlazorWebAssembly targets to work with updated wasm targets #20742
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0.4xx' => 'main' #20731
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adding retries to nuget package downloader #20727
    Area-Workloads
  • [ASP.NET Core] Updates the license headers for Razor files #20699
    Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • Prevent null ref in RazorSourceGenerator #20734
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update branding for 3.1.120 #20705
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix PlatformNotSupportedException for Windows (arm64) #20704
    Area-Workloads
  • Update branding for 5.0.402 #20708
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding for 3.1.414 #20711
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding for 5.0.208 #20712
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Razor] Unskip tests #20600
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Prevent null ref in RazorSourceGenerator #20719
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix workload hidden options #20646
    Area-Workloads

Updated

  • [WIP] Support installing workloads in user folder #18823
    Area-Workloads
  • Only warn about references that are actually needed at runtime #20567
    Area-Compatibility
  • Do not specify a protocol if server does not require secrets #20577
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Cache results of ResolveTargetingPackAssets across builds #19570
    Area-NetSDK
  • [Razor] Ensure the manifest is not generated when there are no assets or discovery patterns #20607
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Disable main loc build while release/6.0.1xx is running #20648
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Razor] Fix casing issue when matching projects to configurations #20603
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [Razor] Fixes packing on multitargeting projects #20609
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [Blazor] Fix duplicate entries in blazor.boot.json manifest extensions #20602
    Area-AspNetCore

Issues

Updated

  • Champion "Constant interpolated strings" #2951

  • [Proposal]: Raw string literal #4304

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • File-scoped namespace puts semicolon on newline if a comment exists #56232
  • Running roslyn tests on a checked build of the runtime #56231
  • Pattern-matching can be O(2^n) to compile for some kinds of switches #56230
  • Member selection dialog for Pull Members Up, Extract Base Class, and Move Static Members should warn if dependents aren't selected #56226
  • When a C# compiler unit-test is executed after a compiler change in Roslyn solution, the test is executed against old compiler bits #56219
  • Partial simple program doesn't apply any attributes on `Main` method #56217
  • roslyn Code generators having issues when using external dependencies,. ex: Newtonsoft.Json #56216

Closed

  • CS0220 on uint.MaxValue + (nuint)42 #51714
    17.0
  • The "Change namespace to match folder structure" refactoring duplicates the root namespace #56220
  • Provide real implementation for AssemblySymbol.RuntimeSupportsStaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces #53800
    17.0
  • Some msbuild properties get corrupted before being passed to Roslyn analyzers #56180
    17.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Include ref info for parameters > 16 in synthesized delegate type name #56233
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements
  • Merge all source generator state in CompilationTracker into a helper type. #56229
    Area-IDE
  • Update VS SDK references #56228
    Area-IDE
  • Stop marking main-vs-deps insertion PR as draft #56227
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Filter the directive trivia when code generation service try to reuse the syntax #56222
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid telemetry for unavoidable XmlException #56221
    Area-IDE
  • Eliminate 75GB allocations during binding in a performance trace #56218
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #56192
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Rework our netstandard1.3 test references #56223
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix doubleclick for Value Tracking #56188
    Area-IDE, Feature - IDE Value Tracking, Next
  • Native Int: constant folding is executed at runtime rather than compile-time if the result depends on the size of native integers #56145
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56225
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56224
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Don't try to rename references in source generated files #56189
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove the HasCompilation flag. #56132
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56193
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Provide real implementation for RuntimeSupportsStaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces property. #56173
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces, Next
  • More options refactoring #56089
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56210
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • New feature: Detect variable swaps and suggest using the new tuple-idiomatic-form if available. #56215
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, 17.1
  • Add readme.md listing breaking changes doc chronologically #56019
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Add External Access options for TypeScript #56187
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56235
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move VS lsp client implementation to EditorFeatures for VSMac #56051
    Area-IDE
  • Remove declaration-only-compilation from CompilationTracker #56139
    Area-IDE
  • Completion: Suggest "await" after dot of awaitable expression #55817
    Area-IDE
  • Use bulk unsubscribe operations in FileChangeWatcher #55890
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56209
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Use 1ES build pools #56186
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Inline Hints: Added double click on hint to insert text #55737
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Inline Parameter Hints
  • Initial fix for issue "VB Formatting of LineContinuation Wrong after _ ' Comment" #54559
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Apply arcade-powered source-build patches #55823
    Area-Infrastructure, Source-Build
  • Fix crashes in some nullable error scenarios #56190
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types
  • Support implicit conversions of lambda expressions to LambdaExpression #56200
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements
  • List patterns: subsumption checking #53891
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.0

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • UseAngularCliServer blocked by node processes it's leaving open from prior execution #36250
  • Error running signalr in google app engine #36249
  • Startup regression: json #36244
  • Perf improvement: json #36243
  • SQLException when using usermanager.ResetPasswordAsync #36240
  • Named Tuples On RenderFragments Not Working and Razor intellisense is holding onto reference #36229
  • Offload websocket receive to scheduler threads #36226
  • When launching WebAssembly hosted app from VS2022 Pre5, changes are not shown #36225
    6.0-rc2
  • dotnet watch script injection still doesn't update etag #36219
    6.0.0
  • dotnet watch hot reload not working in default WebAssembly Hosted project template (RC2) #36218
    6.0-rc2
  • Startup improvement: json #36217
  • Startup regression: fortunes_ef, updates #36216
  • POSTing large form data silently results in null-parameters #36214

Closed

  • dotnet watch only trigges on changes OUTSIDE VisualStudio #34418
    6.0-rc2
  • Razor Source Generator is throwing and Razor tooling never lights up #36227
    6.0-rc2
  • Docs for delayed client certificates #34006
    6.0.0
  • Add an option to the Web API project template to allow the included content to use Minimal APIs instead of controllers #35996
    6.0-rc2
  • Kestrel on Debian/Ubuntu not sending private intermediate cert #36202
  • dotnet dev-certs tool prints incorrect example usage #36008
    7.0-preview1
  • 🐞 `WebApplication.CreateBuilder(args).Host.Properties` cannot share context value. #36197
  • a typeparam property set unexpectedly to null after changing the Value of another typeparam #34160
    Discussions
  • ComplexObjectModelBinder sealed and setProperty internal #33545
    Discussions
  • OnParameterSetAsync is triggered when using a CascadingParameter and NavigationManager #33785
    Discussions
  • Trigger msbuild target when hot reload detects Razor file change (Blazor) #33861
    Discussions
  • Feature Request: Blazor: Handling of ambiguous routes #33963
    Discussions
  • InputFile Improvements #34040
    Discussions
  • [Annoucement] ClientCertificate property no longer triggers renegotiation for HttpSys #34124
    Discussions
  • Navigating to non blazor page from blazor makes referrer incorrect #34198
    Discussions
  • WebApplicationBuilder.WebHost.UseUrls() does not do anything in ASP.NET Core 6 Preview 7 #36245
  • Startup regression: plaintext #36200
  • Perf regression: mvc #36215
  • ProtectKeysWithCertificate(thumbprint) does NOT Throw an Exception if the Certificate is Inaccessible due to Permissions #35602
    6.0-rc2
  • Hot reload not working in visual studio 2022 preview #35902

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0 Cleanup remaining SSP references #36248
    area-infrastructure
  • Backport #36207 to 6.0 #36247
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor
  • Update branding for 5.0.11 #36236
  • Update branding for 3.1.20 #36235
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/5.0] Update selenium version for E2E tests #36231
    area-mvc
  • [release/6.0] [Static web assets] Fix casing issues during parsing #36228
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Add minimal option to webapi template (#36068) #36241
    7.0-preview1
  • Fix sample usage for --format argument #36009
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Big-endian fixes: binary data in RenderBatch #36221
    area-blazor, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0] Don't log status messages for debug proxy. Fixes #35292 #36223
    area-blazor, 6.0-rc2
  • Adding test coverage for host builder properties #36201
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • Make E2E tests work on Linux, support retries, and have new Azure pipeline #36207
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Update selenium version for E2E tests #36230
    area-mvc, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0] Update ChromeDriver version #36232
    area-mvc, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0]: Fix how host configuration is handled in WebApplicationBuilder #36233
    area-runtime, feature-minimal-hosting
  • Add minimal option to webapi template #36068
    area-mvc
  • [release/6.0] React to dotnet/runtime#57816 #36155
    area-infrastructure, 6.0-rc2
  • Fix how host configuration is handled in WebApplicationBuilder #36186
    feature-minimal-hosting, area-web-frameworks
  • Update templates to use scoped CSS (#35658) #36027
    area-mvc
  • [Static web assets] Fix casing issues during parsing #35564
    area-mvc
  • Use ArrayPool as default pool fallback #35719
    area-runtime
  • Don't log status messages for debug proxy. Fixes #35292 #36220
    area-blazor
  • Big-endian fixes: binary data in RenderBatch #35714
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Updated

  • Move OpenAPI extensions to routing assembly #36161
    area-web-frameworks
  • Support platforms where crossgen2 is not available #35916
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Bootstrap v4 support #35981
    area-identity
  • [Blazor] Update npm dependencies #36088
    area-blazor
  • Add analyzer for detecting mismatched endpoint parameter optionality #36154
    area-web-frameworks
  • [release/6.0] Fix root '<PageTitle>' not working when a default, static '<title>' is provided #36099
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor
  • Use minimal APIs for F# project templates #35833
    area-mvc
  • [SignalR] Add Http options to Negotiate metadata #36078
    area-signalr
  • WIP: Strongly-typed SignalR hub proxies and callback handlers #33717
    area-signalr, api-suggestion, community-contribution
  • Add build troubleshooting suggestion #36178
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Migration Bundles: Flow configuration from project #25906
  • InMemory provider deletes wrong entry when DELETE and ADD for same PK #25905
  • New virtual method QuerySqlGenerator.GenerateSelect #25900
    Backlog
  • Changing string property to required results in unexpected default value in migration #25899

Closed

  • SqliteMathTranslator throws an exception on ubuntu in .Net 6 / EFCore 6 preview 6 #25314
  • No coercion operator is defined between types 'System.DateTime' and 'System.Nullable`1[System.TimeSpan]' #23784
    6.0.0
  • QuerySqlGenerator.VisitOrdering does not use GeneratePseudoFromClause #25908
  • 6.0 API Reviews #24743
    6.0.0-rc1
  • Avoid generating proxies when they're not needed #25892
  • Attribute.IsDefined is a perf hotsport during model building #25891
  • Cosmos: Find / FindAsync missing key throws exception instead of returning null #25115
    6.0.0
  • Suggestion. Use a stable sorting algorithm #25228
    6.0.0
  • Deadlock when concurrently deleting disjoint graphs with two levels of cascade #15180
    6.0.0
  • `dotnet ef migrations` Invalidates SLN Cache, Resulting a Full Recompile #25878
  • #An operation was scaffolded that may result in the loss of data. Please review the migration for accuracy. #25794
  • Order By Date Descending Doesn't Return Correctly #25706
  • Scaffolding doesn't generate default values #25654
  • [Cosmos] Objects sometimes corrupted and mutated in memory on DbContext.Set<T>().Add call #25560

PullRequests

Created

  • Add test for scaffolding multiple indexes on the same column #25917
  • Query: Convert SingleResult compared to null to Any #25914
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #25913
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0' => 'main' #25912
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Support no termination in SQL Server CREATE TABLE migration operation #25911
  • Remove MethodCallCodeFragment constructor accepting a chained call #25910
  • Don't mark property as loaded in lazy-loader if lazy-loading fails #25898
  • Avoid stack overflow when saving multiple modified entities with the same key #25897

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25915
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw to 2.0.6 #25730
  • Query: Add regression test for #23784 #25855
  • Update branding for 3.1.20 #25901
  • Update branding for 5.0.11 #25902
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25877
  • Cosmos: return null instead of throwing from Find #25887
  • Sort inserts to preserve tracking order in more cases. #25874

Updated

  • Store store-generated FK values in the store-generated snapshot #25894
  • Allow setting original/current values using a typed dictionary #25895
